long_description: Featuring a unique tapered diamond tip that floats in soft snow and resists hooking in crust, the Icelantic Shaman skis provide everything you need to charge off the beaten path. 160mm tips offer best-in-class flotation and stability, and tapered tails center your weight to create aggressive turns in powder. 110mm waists are made for powder, but put the Icelantic Shaman skis on edge and enjoy the transition to groomed runs. Multiple layers of fiberglass are layered around a poplar wood core to provide high responsiveness. Standard camber underfoot provides responsive carving on hardpack. P-tex sidewalls and layers of rubber foil enhance edge grip and reduce vibrations. The 110mm waists of the Icelantic Shaman skis require bindings with wide brakes. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: Featuring a unique tapered diamond tip that floats in soft snow and resists hooking in crust, the Icelantic Shaman skis provide everything you need to charge off the beaten path.
